item.title: Bio
item.author: maxhalford25@gmail.com (Max Halford)
item.description: Hi there 👋, I’m a third-year Ph.D. student at Paul Sabatier University, doing my research for Renault’s Applied Artificial Intelligence team. I work on NLP and Knowledge Graph. In addition, I study Mutual Learning and Knowledge Distillation. Some of the applications of my PhD are: Information Retrieval 📑 Classification 🔍 Recommendation ⭐️ Knowledge-intensive tasks 📚 I’m a Python developer interested in: Software Engineering 🐍 Statistics 📈 Data Viz 📊 Databases 💾 Cloud 🐳 I contribute to some open-source libraries and often participate in machine learning competitions.
